scripts.start: set DEBUG=notes:* && set SEQUELIZE_CONNECT=models/sequelize-sqlite.json&& set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-sequelize&& set USERS_MODEL=models/users-rest&& set USER_SERVICE_URL=http://localhost:3333&& node ./bin/www
scripts.start-sqlite3: set DEBUG=notes:* && set SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 && set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-sqlite3&&node ./bin/www
scripts.server1-sqlite3: set SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 && set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-sqlite3&& set PORT=3001 && node ./bin/www
scripts.server2-sqlite3: set SQLITE_FILE=notes.sqlite3 && set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-sqlite3&& set PORT=3002 && node ./bin/www
scripts.server1-mongodb: set DEBUG=notes:* && set MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/notes&&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-mongodb&& set PORT=3001 && node ./bin/www
scripts.server2-mongodb: set DEBUG=notes:* && set MONGO_URL=mongodb://localhost/notes&&set NOTES_MODEL=models/notes-mongodb&& set PORT=3002 && node ./bin/www
scripts.bootstrapsetup: cd bower_components/bootstrap && npm install && npm install grunt-cli
scripts.buildbootstrap: cp variables.less bower_components/bootstrap/less && cd bower_components/bootstrap && grunt
